physDesc.p: Fragments 1-14 (in mm), (1) 24 x 45, (A) 2 lines, top margin (?), (B) blank, (2) 35 x 24, (A) 5 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (3) 65 x 30, (A) 5 lines, top right margins, (B) blank, (4) 74 x 25, (A) 3 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (5) 80 x 29, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (6) 105 x 20, 6 lines, top margin (?), (B) blank, (7) 40 x 55, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) 1 line, margins (?), (8) 42 x 62, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (9) 53 x 125, (A) 3 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (10) 38 x 33 (A) 3 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (11) 40 x 21, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (12) 60 x 24, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (13) 25 x 56, (A) 1 line, left top (?) margins, (B) traces, (14) 29 x 25, (A) 2 lines, top (?) margin, (B) blank
